name: Day 4: Nested Interactive Components
description:
Welcome to day 4 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! We're going to take Interactive Components a step further, by nesting them. In the file you will find:

  1. A gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference


Feel free to follow the prompt or create a new, unique nested Interactive Component. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
